collectible.title: Premium Bubbly
collectible.subtitle: Just don't drink too much!
collectible.text: The high quality booze that Aqua loves to drink until she's out cold. She commonly falls asleep while clinging onto a bottle.

collectible.title: Axis Church sign up sheet
collectible.subtitle: Join today! The soap is so good you can even eat it!
collectible.text: A sign up sheet for people to pledge their hearts and souls to the order of Axis, and the goddess of water, Aqua. It seems Aqua forgot to translate it to English...
